body:
Nice to see a by the book senpai / kohai uke doujin.
The uke must suck and submit to the seme.
Always.
Be it 4 love or for lust.
Seme should never be on his knees to lick even ukes butt let alone suck cock.
And the senpai take it in the butt?
No fuking way.
What kinda shit is that?
Someone has to be the man and its better if its the taller older big bro never the little one and no both ways.
Uke should always be the woman.
I love Kuga and all these new World Trigger doujins, but I kinda want some Hyuse doujins...
